name: Granola
title: granola.ai
shortDescription: Granola is an AI-powered notepad designed for individuals with back-to-back meetings. It transcribes meeting audio directly without requiring bots to join the call, enhancing notes with AI to ensure they are comprehensive and actionable. Ideal for busy professionals, Granola simplifies note-taking and sharing across platforms, making meetings more productive.
pros: Enhances notes with AI for clarity and actionability
cons: Dependent on quality of audio input
